page.title: 11ARMED FORCES
page.content: The armed forces are represented by an RAF base on the south-west of Alness. They have been present in the area since the 2nd World War at a camp on the flat delta area of the River Averon. There are approximately 90 men based here at present. Each family stays here for about four years before transfer to another base. A number of the airmen serve in the Marine Section at Invergordon some four miles away.In April 1986,this section is due to close with the loss of over half the jobs. On the camp there is single and married accommodation,offices and recreation facilities.
